languages.text: "Ваша прошлая заправила хорошо понимала одну вещь: не приближаться к судам с десятиной, даже не смотреть на них. А иначе..." {n}Проктор делает жест, и Глейто клацает зубами, потянувшись в сторону "агента негоциаций".{/n}

"Your previous ringleader was keenly aware of one rule: never get near a tithe ship — never even look in the direction of one. Or else..." {n}The Proctor makes a gesture, and Glaito gnashes his teeth, leaning closer to the "commercionary agent."{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ваша прошлая заправила хорошо понимала одну вещь: не приближаться к судам с десятиной, даже не смотреть на них. А иначе..." {n}Проктор делает жест, и Глейто клацает зубами, потянувшись в сторону "агента негоциаций".{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Your previous ringleader was keenly aware of one rule: never to come close to tithe ships, never even to look in the direction of one. Or else..." {n}The Proctor makes a gesture, and Glaito gnashes his teeth, leaning closer to the "commercionary agent."{/n}

"Your previous ringleader was keenly aware of one rule: never to come close to tithe ships, never even to look in the direction of one. Or else..." {n}The Proctor makes a gesture, and Glaito gnashes his teeth, leaning closer to the "commercionary agent."{/n}

"Your previous ringleader was keenly aware of one rule: never get near a tithe ship — never even look in the direction of one. Or else..." {n}The Proctor makes a gesture, and Glaito gnashes his teeth, leaning closer to the "commercionary agent."{/n}

"Your previous ringleader was keenly aware of one rule: never get near a tithe ship — never even look in the direction of one. Or else..." {n}The Proctor makes a gesture, and Glaito gnashes his teeth, leaning closer to the "commercionary agent."{/n}

"Your previous ringleader was keenly aware of one rule: never get near a tithe ship — never even look in the direction of one. Or else..." {n}The Proctor makes a gesture, and Glaito gnashes his teeth, leaning closer to the "commercionary agent."{/n}

"Your previous ringleader was keenly aware of one rule: never get near a tithe ship — never even look in the direction of one. Or else..." {n}The Proctor makes a gesture, and Glaito gnashes his teeth, leaning closer to the "commercionary agent."{/n}

languages.text: “你们之前的头领，有条原则非常清楚——绝对不准靠近运输什一税的货船，最好连货船的方向都别看。要是违反了这条原则……”{n}索罗蒙比了个手势。格雷托呲着尖牙，朝这位“贸务代理人”靠得更近了。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your previous ringleader was keenly aware of one rule: never get near a tithe ship — never even look in the direction of one. Or else..." {n}The Proctor makes a gesture, and Glaito gnashes his teeth, leaning closer to the "commercionary agent."{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你们之前的头领，有条原则非常清楚——绝对不准靠近运输什一税的货船，最好连货船的方向都别看。要是违反了这条原则……”{n}索罗蒙比了个手势。格雷托呲着尖牙，朝这位“贸务代理人”靠得更近了。{/n}

languages.text: «Su anterior líder era plenamente consciente de una regla: no se acerque a una nave del diezmo. Es más, ni siquiera la mire. De lo contrario...». {n}El Procurador hace un gesto y Glaito muerde el aire, acercándose al «agente comercial».{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your previous ringleader was keenly aware of one rule: never get near a tithe ship — never even look in the direction of one. Or else..." {n}The Proctor makes a gesture, and Glaito gnashes his teeth, leaning closer to the "commercionary agent."{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Su anterior líder era plenamente consciente de una regla: no se acerque a una nave del diezmo. Es más, ni siquiera la mire. De lo contrario...». {n}El Procurador hace un gesto y Glaito muerde el aire, acercándose al «agente comercial».{/n}

languages.text: « Votre prédécesseure avait très bien intégré cette unique règle : ne vous avisez jamais de vous approcher d'un vaisseau chargé du transport de la dîme. N'essayez même pas de l'observer. Sinon... » {n}Le proctor esquisse un geste et Glaito fait claquer ses mâchoires en direction de "l'agent commercionnaire".{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your previous ringleader was keenly aware of one rule: never get near a tithe ship — never even look in the direction of one. Or else..." {n}The Proctor makes a gesture, and Glaito gnashes his teeth, leaning closer to the "commercionary agent."{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Votre prédécesseure avait très bien intégré cette unique règle : ne vous avisez jamais de vous approcher d'un vaisseau chargé du transport de la dîme. N'essayez même pas de l'observer. Sinon... » {n}Le proctor esquisse un geste et Glaito fait claquer ses mâchoires en direction de "l'agent commercionnaire".{/n}

languages.text: 「お前たちの前の頭目は、ある鉄則をよく理解していた—租税船には絶対に近づくな。見てもいけない。さもないと…」{n}代理人がジェスチャーをすると、グライトは牙をむき出しにして唸りながら「商業エージェント」に、にじり寄った。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your previous ringleader was keenly aware of one rule: never get near a tithe ship — never even look in the direction of one. Or else..." {n}The Proctor makes a gesture, and Glaito gnashes his teeth, leaning closer to the "commercionary agent."{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「お前たちの前の頭目は、ある鉄則をよく理解していた—租税船には絶対に近づくな。見てもいけない。さもないと…」{n}代理人がジェスチャーをすると、グライトは牙をむき出しにして唸りながら「商業エージェント」に、にじり寄った。{/n}

languages.text: "Önceki elebaşınız şu kuralı çok iyi biliyordu: Bir aşar gemisine asla yaklaşmayın. Hatta o yöne bile bakmayın. Yoksa..." {n}Üsteğmen'in işaret etmesi üzerine Glaito, dişlerini gıcırdatarak "ticari temsilciye" yaklaşıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your previous ringleader was keenly aware of one rule: never get near a tithe ship — never even look in the direction of one. Or else..." {n}The Proctor makes a gesture, and Glaito gnashes his teeth, leaning closer to the "commercionary agent."{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Önceki elebaşınız şu kuralı çok iyi biliyordu: Bir aşar gemisine asla yaklaşmayın. Hatta o yöne bile bakmayın. Yoksa..." {n}Üsteğmen bir işaret yapıyor ve Glaito dişlerini gıcırdatarak "taciri temsilcisine" yaklaşıyor.{/n}

languages.text: "Eurem vorigen Rädelsführer war eine Regel sehr bewusst: Nähere dich nie einem Zehntschiff – blicke nicht einmal in seine Richtung. Sonst ..." {n}Der Proktor macht eine Geste, und Glaito knirscht mit den Zähnen, während er sich dem "Kammerzonialrat" weiter nähert.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your previous ringleader was keenly aware of one rule: never get near a tithe ship — never even look in the direction of one. Or else..." {n}The Proctor makes a gesture, and Glaito gnashes his teeth, leaning closer to the "commercionary agent."{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Eurem vorigen Rädelsführer war eine Regel sehr bewusst: Nähere dich nie einem Zehntschiff – blicke nicht einmal in seine Richtung. Sonst ..." {n}Der Proktor macht eine Geste, und Glaito knirscht mit den Zähnen, während er sich dem "Kammerzonialrat" weiter nähert.{/n}
